item.title: Help with getting npcs to say i am online/offline
item.dc:creator: @toastface5 toastface5
item.description:
@toastface5 wrote:

I followed i ancients i’s tut on getting NPCs to say what u like. I did it, but when i log in, it says I am offline, even though i am online…

the piece of script in my npc.handler says:

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Mr Fish")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Mr Fish is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Mr Fish is offline!"; }

can anybody help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with getting npcs to say i am online/offline
